data.title: Nvidia Agrees to Acquire Israeli AI Software Provider Run:ai
data.meta_description: Nvidia Corp. has agreed to acquire Israeli startup Run:ai, which develops software for handling artificial intelligence computing resources.
data.text:
Nvidia Corp. has agreed to acquire Israeli startup Run:ai, which develops software for handling artificial intelligence computing resources.

Run:ai has been a close collaborator with Nvidia since 2020, the Santa Clara, California-based chipmaker said in a statement on Wednesday. It didnâ€™t disclose the terms of the deal, but Israeli newspaper Calcalist pegged the value of the transaction at $700 million.
